imdb.plot outline: So let's take a little bit of comedy, mix that with heated sports debates, sprinkle some entertainment and add a dash of on location reporting. Toss all of those ingredients into the minds of several attention starved creative people from Sudbury and you get The Episode! With a fierce determination to get better every damn time we shoot, the crew at The Episode strives to make you laugh, make you think and make you realize that you live in an awesome town. Filmed at SRO Nightclub & Lounge in Sudbury's downtown, The Episode combines late night talk show humour with local guests and talent. Showcasing area trends, community information and the incredibly talented people living in Northern Ontario; The Episode is a must-see. Tune in weekly or visit a live taping at SRO.
imdb.title: The Episode
